TopicTitle: Made a model for an engine part, but if i use it the engine makes no propulsion.

Articles.Content: I made a model for a engine part in Blender and successfully exported it to KSP through Unity, but when i tested it ingame i got no propulsion or engine fx whatsoever even through throttle is on max, engine sounds are running and fuel is being burn. Then I took a stock engine model file from the game and tested the cfg file with it and it worked just fine. What did I do wrong?
make you have a thrustTransform in the MU and it's not close to a collision mesh in the +Z direction.
